type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: STATUS OF ALIENS ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the Status of Aliens Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Status of Aliens Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Interpretation.
type.context: STATUS OF ALIENS ACT under Interpretation. 2. In this Act, alien has the meaning assigned to it by article 232 of the Constitution.
type.description: In this Act, alien has the meaning assigned to it by article 232 of the Constitution.
